skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: A mighty beast wracked by corrosion and decay, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass, this rotting creation of the Urfather is the personal mount of Valnir.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Noxious Vessel
skillTree.description: Thusly, the virulent maladies of the Crow are borne forth to repulse and infect its mortal foes; there lieth victory eternal.

skillTree.name: Putrefying Ooze
skillTree.description: This fetid, disgusting pus is so repulsive to the untainted that it mimics traditional armour of far greater substance.

skillTree.name: Angel of Disease
skillTree.description: "My bedfellows are pestilence, famine and war… but mainly pestilence."

effects.description:
Growth per region: +5 after winning a battle
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gatherer of Souls
skillTree.description: Valnir's blows do not only kill, they consume the souls of his victims as well. Much of this stolen energy is passed to Lord Nurgle, but it also strengthens Valnir, making him stronger and faster in his task of collecting souls.

skillTree.name: Brain Fever
skillTree.description: As their brains become infested with worms and a burning fewer, the victims become insane and weak-willed.

skillTree.name: Black Rot
skillTree.description: The flesh of the victims of the Black Rot turns dark, their hair falls out and their skin becomes a leprous, putrefied mess.

skillTree.name: Red Plague
skillTree.description: The horrifying disease of the north wipes out men like a scythe cuts wheat.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Nurgle's Blessed
skillTree.description: His body has been crushed in battle many times, yet he has always risen again, ever eager to slay more and leave their rotting carcasses empty of their essence, their souls sent screaming to the realm of Nurgle.

ui_effects.description: Chance of unit gaining hit points

skillTree.name: The Reaper Comes
skillTree.description: Valnir is surrounded by the sickly stench of death and a cloud of carrion flies hovers around him wherever he goes, flies that bite and claw at any who sense his presence. For with Valnir hunting, death and decay is inevitable.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rot-Eaters
skillTree.description: Imagine a rubbery, pus-filled bag lurching towards you. Now imagine it is travelling at twice its usual speed...

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +3 for Plague Toad, Knights of Nurgle, Chaos Chariots of Nurgle and Pox Rider units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Plague Toad, Knights of Nurgle, Chaos Chariots of Nurgle and Pox Rider units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Plague Toad, Knights of Nurgle, Chaos Chariots of Nurgle and Pox Rider units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Plague Toad, Knights of Nurgle, Chaos Chariots of Nurgle and Pox Rider units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Plague Toad, Knights of Nurgle, Chaos Chariots of Nurgle and Pox Rider units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Armour of Malady
skillTree.description: Sensible enemies think at least twice before attacking such a diseased specimen, for even if they win, chances are they have caught something really nasty along the way.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Spawn of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Spawn of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Spawn of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Spawn of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Spawn of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Nauseating Mutations
skillTree.description: Grandfather loves the smallest of his many children at least as much as his myriad other grim creations, if not more so.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for Beast of Nurgle, Warhounds and Nurglings units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Beast of Nurgle, Warhounds and Nurglings units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 3% for Beast of Nurgle, Warhounds and Nurglings units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Beast of Nurgle, Warhounds and Nurglings units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 6% for Beast of Nurgle, Warhounds and Nurglings units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bubonic Buzzers
skillTree.description: The flying things are beloved of Nurgle, for they are, oft-times, the method of infection for his most potent, hideous infirmities.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Rot Flies, Plague Drones and Chaos Fury units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Rot Flies, Plague Drones and Chaos Fury units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Rot Flies, Plague Drones and Chaos Fury units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Rot Flies, Plague Drones and Chaos Fury units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Rot Flies, Plague Drones and Chaos Fury units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Filth Incarnate
skillTree.description: None more foul. None more black. Yuk.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Great Unclean One, Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle and Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Great Unclean One, Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle and Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Great Unclean One, Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle and Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +15 for Great Unclean One, Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle and Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Great Unclean One, Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle and Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

skillTree.name: Virulent Contagion
skillTree.description: Sickness so vile that it strikes as true and as hard as the perfect sword-blow.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warshrine and Forsaken of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cankerous Spread
skillTree.description: The corrosive ooze emanating from the most ulcerous sores is one of the most effective weapons in the Urfather's foul armoury.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Warhounds, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Warhounds, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Airborne Agues
skillTree.description: The air most creatures breathe provides just another avenue of attack for Nurgle and his many and varied contagions.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Putrid Resistance
skillTree.description: Blade and point and spell can be turned aside very easily by the Fly Lord's most-favoured servants.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +7 for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Blessed by Blight
skillTree.description: Just as all life is born, so it must wither and die. Before that happens comes disease, in all its disgusting, filth-ridden glory.

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pestilential Spawnings
skillTree.description: Those corrupted by Nurgle's rot flock to his putrid banner in the hope that they will be reborn anew in Grandfather's image.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Valnir the Reaper
backgroundSkills.description: Only Valnir and his patron know how many souls he must gather before he can rest again. In the passage of time Valnir has come to hate all living beings because they stubbornly hold onto their souls and do not surrender them to his lord Nurglc. His flesh has rotted almost completely away. His Chaos armour is a shattered ruin. Maggots writhe in his eye sockets. His entrails ooze through the gaps in his armour. Yet a terrifying strength lives on in his skeletal frame. His grip is like iron, and no foe struck by his terrible flail ever recovers. The more he slays, the greater his vitality grows. His body has been crushed in battle many times, yet he has always risen again, ever eager to slay more and leave their rotting carcasses empty of their essence, their souls sent screaming to the realm of Nurgle.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +15%
	(Lord's army)

Enemy leadership: -8
	(enemy armies in local province)
